table.mysql: CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.files}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `filesize` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `upload_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `upload_user` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `type` int(11) unsigned default '0', `width` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `height` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `public` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `filename` varchar(255) default NULL, `count_downloads` tinyint(1) default NULL, `downloads` int(11) default NULL, `image` int(11) default NULL, `image_version` tinyint(2) default NULL, `md5sum` varchar(32) default NULL, `manual_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `valid_from` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `valid_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ); ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.files}` ADD `md5sum` varchar(32); ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.files}` ADD column `manual_date` int (11) NULL after `md5sum`; ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.files}` ADD column `valid_date` int (11) NOT NULL default '0' after `manual_date`; ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.files}` ADD column `valid_from` int (11) NOT NULL default '0' after `manual_date`;

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.files_tree}` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `l` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `r` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `pid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `level` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `tree_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `l` (`l`), KEY `r` (`r`), KEY `level` (`level`), KEY `pid` (`pid`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.files_versions}` ( `file_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `version` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `width` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `height` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `filesize` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `type` tinyint(3) unsigned default NULL );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.files_tree_details}` ( `node_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `creation_date` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `creation_user` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `mod_date` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `mod_user` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `active` tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '0', `download_count` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `md5` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `isFolder` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', `public` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`node_id`,`lang`) );
ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.files_tree_details}` ADD `image` int(11); ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.files_tree_details}` ADD `image_version` int(11);

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.files_revision}` ( `file_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `revision` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `mod_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `mod_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `comment` mediumtext, `details` blob, `filename` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `filetitle` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`file_id`,`revision`) );
